title: WiTZ - Board Game
description:
Do you love Chess, Othello, Reversi, Go? Does strategizing thrills you? Look no further! WiTZ Turf will challenge your strategizing skills to the limits!

WiTZ - HALF TO FULL, WHIZ WILL RULE! - is a smart reinvention of Reversi. Playing with a set of four 2-color square discs makes this familiar game tough to master.

WiTZ Turf's FEATURES
* 11 Board Sizes - 4X4 to 14X14
* Rapid WiTZ - Enjoy a rapid fire game
* 300+ Start Combinations
* 3 Levels of AI Engine. 2 Player mode
